data.title: Election Resources
data.meta_description: Register or update online www.oregonvotes.gov, or complete a Voter Registration Card available at most post offices or the County Clerk's office.   Upcoming Election Information November 5, 2024 General Election Local Filed Candidates: County Offices: Local Partisan Candidates: County Commissioner, Position 1, 4 year term – Democrat – No candidate Filed Republican – Joan Bird … Continued
data.text:
Upcoming Election Information

November 5, 2024 General Election

Local Filed Candidates:

County Offices:

Local Partisan Candidates:

County Commissioner, Position 1, 4 year term –

Democrat – No candidate Filed

Republican – Joan Bird

Local Non-Partisan Candidates:

Justice of the Peace, 2 year unexpired term – Shandie Johnson

County Sheriff, 4 year term – James Burgett

County Clerk, 4 year term – Kristi Weis

City Offices:

City of Grass Valley

City of Moro

City of Rufus

City of Wasco

District Offices:

Sherman County Soil and Water Conservation District (SWCD)

Important dates:

Candidates:

August 27, 2024 - Last day to file for office

August 30, 2024 – Last day to withdraw

Voters:

September 21, 2024 - Military/overseas ballots mailed

October 7, 2024 - Out of state voter ballots mailed

October 15, 2024 - Last day to register to vote

October 16th – 18th, 2024 - Ballots mailed to voters

October 17, 2024 - Sherman County drop boxes open

November 05, 2024 Election Day

County Clerk’s office open 7am – 8pm; Official Sherman County drop boxes close at 8pm.

Grass Valley - 109 Mill Street

Official white ballot box located next to the sidewalk, in front of City Hall, to the left of the city payment box. Available 24 hours.

Moro - 500 Court Street

Official white, red & blue ballot box at the corner of Court & 5th streets. Available 24 hours.

In the Clerk's Office; Regular business hours Monday - Friday 8am-5pm; Election day hours 7am-8pm.

Rufus - 304 W 2nd Street

Official white, red & blue ballot box located in the City Hall parking lot. Available 24 hours.

Wasco - Corner of Clark & Fulton Streets

Official white, red & blue ballot box located just uphill from the stop sign at the corner of Fulton & Clark Streets and south of the City Hall sidewalk. City Hall is located at 1017 Clark Street. Available 24 hours.
